paragraphs.zh-tw: Today I'm going to talk about unexpected discoveries. Now I work in the solar technology industry.
paragraphs.en: 今天我要講的主題是 令人想像不到的新發現。 我從事太陽能科技產業。

paragraphs.zh-tw: And my small startup is looking to force ourselves into the environment by paying attention to ... ... paying attention to crowd-sourcing.
paragraphs.en: 我新創立的小公司， 想要藉由 群眾外包的力量， 將我們自己 融入環境之中。

paragraphs.zh-tw: It's just a quick video of what we do. Huh. Hang on a moment.
paragraphs.en: 這是個介紹我們工作的 簡短影片。 稍微等一下。

paragraphs.zh-tw: It might take a moment to load. We'll just -- we can just skip -- I'll just skip through the video instead ...
paragraphs.en: 可能要花點時間啟動。 我看我們就... 我就直接跳過這段影片。
好吧。 太陽能科技是...

paragraphs.zh-tw: Oh, that's all my time? Okay. Thank you very much.
paragraphs.en: 喔，我的時間到了嗎？ 好吧。非常謝謝你們。

title: A Ted Speaker S Worst Nightmare
